## StaticMenu class

An easy to use scaffolding of a static Menu. Just implement the execute method that occurs when a given menu-entry is choosen.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare abstract class StaticMenu implements Menu 
```
**Implements:** [Menu](./forms42core.menu.md)
